resources.string: This app is designed for apple sugar inference. Select wavelength and capture images, after capturing images at each wavelength, click inference to get sugar content prediction. \n\nAuthor: Longqian Huang

To use the app, first use the phone camera to get images corresponding 7 wavelengths. The camera parameter should be set as the following instruction:

 Whitebalance: sunligh
 Focal length: 27mm
 680nm: ISO-50, Speed-1/125
 700nm: ISO-125, Speed-1/160
 720nm: ISO-125, Speed-1/125
 760nm: ISO-400, Speed-1/40
 780nm: ISO-800, Speed-1/20
 800nm: ISO-3200, Speed-1/30
 810nm: ISO-3200, Speed-1/15

 After obtaining 7 images, press Inference button to get into inference page. Use Pick button to select one image and click the corresponding wavelength to set feature on it. 

 When each wavelength button becomes green, press Get Sugar to obtain sugar content prediction. 

 Use Cla|Reg switch to change deep learning models, switch left to use classification model, right to use regression model.
超级无敌苹果队\n 鲍宇涵, 曹雯, 黄隆钤\n 浙江大学
